extendedInfo.description: Outdoor Magazine is Michigan's premier outdoor radio show, and this is the best way for podcast listeners to access the show!  In each three hour weekly program, veteran outdoor broadcaster Mike Avery focuses on the history and tradition of the outdoor lifestyle.  The emphasis is on hunting and fishing, but this Michigan based program also looks at conservation and wildlife issues, as well as gear and tactics to get the most from your next outdoor experience. Key Features:-FREE and easy to use. -Access both current and past shows. -Listen via streaming audio. -Download for listening offline. -Functional with both 3G and WiFi. -Links to Facebook, Twitter, YouTube and the Outdoor Magazine Website. -Easily upload photos to Mike. -Contact links and information.

reviews.title: Almost
reviews.comment: Would get 5 stars if you could keep it open in the background and listen while doing other stuff on the phone
